txt.en:
'Dead?! These Corsairs are ruining everything! This will be the end of my business!'

Haelam calms down a little.

'While you're here, could you finish the job you started and make me a couple new crates?'
Haelam is short-handed and could use some help tracking down his workers up in the woods.
Haelam is located in the village of Tadrent.\n\nBring the wood back to Haelam in the village of Tadrent.
The workers' camp-site can be found in the forest south of Tadrent, in the foothills of the Emyn Ernil, above the beacon Nendath.\n\nYou should examine a body and collect wood for Haelam.
The workbench is located near Haelam in Tadrent.\n\nUse the workbench to build crates for Haelam.
Haelam is located in the village of Tadrent.\n\nSpeak with Haelam.
Bring the wood back to Haelam in Tadrent
The workers can be found in the forest south of Tadrent, in the foothills of the Emyn Ernil, above the beacon Nendath.\n\nYou should find the workers there and help them finish their task.
Looks like Corsairs got to the workers first

'These crates are falling apart and we very much need some new ones. Just before you arrived I sent a couple of my workers up to the forest to fetch some wood. The troubling thing is that they haven't returned. Most likely, they took the day off!\n\n'Could you go up to the forest and find them, [placeholder]? While you're at it, bring back some wood and tell those two they don't work for me any more!'
'Decent workmanship, for an adventurer. Now, shouldn't you be out there taking care of those Corsairs?'
This is indeed one of Haelam's workers
